##To Enable Web Sessions and Caches: Client Side

1. Client Browser: SessionStorage:
	https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/sessionStorage
	==>Open Window/tab: create a SessionStorage: host whatever page(s) are opened into this window/tab via Page Session (with page data/object)
	==>(Page Session) Data: stored in sessionStorage is specific to the protocol of the page: http and https: different
	==>(Page Session) Data: survives over page reloads and restores
	==>(Page Session) Data: 2 bytes / char + integer keys are automatically converted to strings
	==>New tab: new page session: with top-level browsing context + That page session is valid only for that particular tab
		==>Multiple tabs/windows with the same URL: creates sessionStorage for each
